process_mgd77_data¶

This module is used to pre-process MGD77 data from NOAA into a simplified comma separated value format that can easily be read by Pandas.

Functions

m77t_to_csv(data)

Formats a .m77t file in a Pandas data frame to a more useful representation.

preprocess_data(folder_path, output_path)

Recursively search through a given folder to find .m77t files.
